title: What happened to the LoL client?
body:
2 years ago I decided to quit this game and today I installed it just to have a look what's up. I instantly noticed that the client is WAY TOO LAGGY. Is there anything I could do to fix this? I'm using a student laptop by the way which I just bought just recently. 

Its processor is AMD A8-7410 APU with AMD Radeon R5 Graphics 2.20 GHz (if that helps)
RAM - 8 GB
AND 64-BIT operating system
